name: cross-browser-tests-runner
description: Seamless cross-browser testing with multiple platforms and runners
author: Reetesh Ranjan

scripts.unit-tests-1: UNIT_TESTS=1 LOG_LEVEL=WARN ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --reporter lcovonly --ui bdd -R spec -t 5000 tests/unit/tests/ci.js tests/unit/tests/core.js tests/unit/tests/platforms/interfaces.js tests/unit/tests/platforms/factory.js tests/unit/tests/platforms/core.js tests/unit/tests/platforms/browserstack/tunnel-deps.js tests/unit/tests/platforms/browserstack/tunnel.js tests/unit/tests/platforms/browserstack/manager.js tests/unit/tests/platforms/browserstack/worker.js tests/unit/tests/platforms/browserstack/webdriver.js
scripts.unit-tests-2: UNIT_TESTS=1 LOG_LEVEL=WARN ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --reporter lcovonly --ui bdd -R spec -t 5000 tests/unit/tests/platforms/browserstack/platform.js
scripts.eslint-unit-tests-1: npm run eslint && npm run unit-tests-1
scripts.unit-tests-win-1: ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --reporter lcovonly --ui bdd -R spec -t 5000 tests/unit/tests/ci.js tests/unit/tests/core.js tests/unit/tests/platforms/interfaces.js tests/unit/tests/platforms/factory.js tests/unit/tests/platforms/core.js tests/unit/tests/platforms/browserstack/tunnel-deps.js tests/unit/tests/platforms/browserstack/tunnel.js tests/unit/tests/platforms/browserstack/manager.js tests/unit/tests/platforms/browserstack/worker.js tests/unit/tests/platforms/browserstack/webdriver.js
scripts.eslint-unit-tests-win-1: npm run eslint && npm run unit-tests-win-1
scripts.cov-html: UNIT_TESTS=1 LOG_LEVEL=WARN ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --ui bdd -R spec -t 5000 tests/unit/tests.js
